signInMessage: Sign in with your email and password.

welcome: Welcome. Let's start by creating an account.
letsStart: Let's start by creating an account.
confirmationSent: We sent a confirmation link to
emailSentSuccess: Email sent successfully! Please check your inbox.
emailVerified: Your email has been successfully verified. Please sign in again to continue.
resetInstructions: Enter the email address associated with your account to receive password reset options.
resetLinkSent: If the email address is linked to an account, a reset link will be sent shortly. Don't see the email? Check your spam folder.
setNewPassword: Set a new password to restore access to your account.
canSignInNow: You can now sign in with your new password.
noAccountFound: We couldn't find an account with that email address. Please try again.
passwordsDoNotMatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
invalidResetLink: Invalid or expired password reset link. Please request a new one.
failedToResetPassword: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
errorResettingPassword: An error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again.
applicationUnderReview: Your application is still under review.
willUpdateViaEmail: We will update you via email. For any inquiries, please
matchingPreferencesUnderReview: Your matching preferences are still under review.
learnMoreAboutProgram: You can learn more about the program
askFewQuestions: We're going to ask you a few questions to get started.
formTakes10Minutes: This form takes ~10 minutes to complete. Your responses will not be saved if you close the tab, or exit this web page.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
failedToSendResetEmail: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your request.
invalidOrExpiredCode: Invalid or expired password reset code

contactAdmin: Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.
